item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GO1 Women
item.description: Barefoot sneaker Nova GO1Our Nova barefoot sneaker is one of our classics and has now also been developed with the popular GO1 sole. The material mix of high-quality nubuck and cowhide leather as well as the breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber make our Nova GO1 a versatile barefoot sneaker. Look forward to a successful mix of colors and materials, a natural barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe box thanks to the anatomical toe box.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Men
item.description: Same same but different: This new Universe comes with new leather and feels even better! Everything else remains uncompromisingly revolutionary: Natural foot freedom and casual street style have never been so flawlessly united. Sharp edges and soft leather turn every outfit into a statement. The completely new, innovative TrueSense® GS1 sole is only 6.9 mm thick, flexible, and durable. It gives you a feeling like barefoot and protects your feet as in a traditional shoe.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Women
item.description: Same same but different: This new Universe comes with new leather and feels even better! Everything else remains uncompromisingly revolutionary: Natural foot freedom and casual street style have never been so flawlessly united. Sharp edges and soft leather turn every outfit into a statement. The completely new, innovative TrueSense® GS1 sole is only 6.9 mm thick, flexible, and durable. It gives you a feeling like barefoot and protects your feet as in a traditional shoe.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Men
item.description: Same same but different: This new Universe comes with new leather and feels even better! Everything else remains uncompromisingly revolutionary: Natural foot freedom and casual street style have never been so flawlessly united. Sharp edges and soft leather turn every outfit into a statement. The completely new, innovative TrueSense® GS1 sole is only 6.9 mm thick, flexible, and durable. It gives you a feeling like barefoot and protects your feet as in a traditional shoe.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Milano Men
item.description: Simply classic: Our Milano is an elegant, ankle-high leather lace-up that adds style to almost any wardrobe. The high-quality leather upper and breathable OnSteam® microfiber inner lining make this barefoot shoe a rugged yet comfortable companion. You can look forward to a wonderful barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe area thanks to the anatomical toe box.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kos Men
item.description: Our Kos is a modern and simple men\'s barefoot sandal, which definitely passes as a unisex model and can thus also be worn by women. The high-quality leather provides a simple and elegant look, the thin and flexible sole, on the other hand, lets you walk noticeably on the ground. Stable support is provided by the slingback strap as well as the wide strap over the foot.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kos Women
item.description: Our Kos is a modern and simple barefoot sandal, which definitely passes as a unisex model and can thus also be worn by women. The high-quality leather provides a simple and elegant look, the thin and flexible sole, on the other hand, lets you walk noticeably on the ground. Stable support is provided by the slingback strap as well as the wide strap over the foot.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Palermo Men
item.description: Our Palermo is a versatile and classic barefoot shoe that lets you combine both chic and sporty. The lace-up made of high-quality leather and a breathable microfiber OnSteam® lining provides a natural barefoot feeling in combination with the thin and flexible sole. With an appearance that\'s reduced to the essentials, here you will find a daily all-rounder for many different occasions. Thanks to the anatomical toe box, your toes have plenty of space for movement.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Palermo Barefoot + Men
item.description: The Palermo Barefoot+ is a versatile and classic barefoot shoe that offers a look that is both chic and sporty.. The lace-up shoe made of high-quality leather with a breathable microfiber OnSteam® lining works in combination with the thin and flexible sole to provide a natural barefoot feel. Featuring a simple, minimalistic design, this shoe is an everyday all-rounder for a wide variety of occasions.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Verona Women
item.description: Want a super soft barefoot feeling? Then our barefoot sandal Verona is just right for you. The high-quality leather sandal has a soft inner padding, an elastic heel strap and plenty of toe room. The crossed straps turn the otherwise plain summer sandal into a fashionable companion that subtly spices up your summer wardrobe. The thin and flexible barefoot sole makes a noticeable difference.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Milano Barefoot + Men
item.description: Simply classic in Barefoot +: Our Milano is an elegant, ankle-high leather lace-up that adds style to almost any wardrobe. The high-quality leather upper and breathable OnSteam® microfiber inner lining make this barefoot shoe a rugged yet comfortable companion. You can look forward to a wonderful barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe area thanks to the wide toe box. Available as a women\'s model in black and as a men\'s model in black and brown.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Kids
item.description: Introducing: Our popular classic, Universe, now available as a children\'s shoe. From now on, even the little ones can enjoy healthy barefoot walking without having to sacrifice a cool sneaker look. The comfortable barefoot shoe for kids provides comfortable barefoot pleasure thanks to its simple Velcro closure, easy entry with a heel loop, and child-friendly left and right labeling on the sole. At the same time, the thin and flexible sole trains the foot muscles from the first steps. The anatomical toe box provides a foot-friendly, wider fit in the toe area, while the breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber ensures a healthy foot climate.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Women
item.description: The Groundies Active Knit is aptly named. This barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active individuals who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it fits like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: a top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Men
item.description: The Groundies Active Knit is aptly named. This barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active individuals who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it fits like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: a top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Men
item.description: The Groundies Active Knit is aptly named. This barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active individuals who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it fits like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: a top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Amsterdam Barefoot+ Women
item.description: Our summer classic among the Groundies barefoot shoes is now also available in Barefoot+: Our Amsterdam is light and airy, can be combined in a variety of ways and, thanks to its wide toe box, provides extra space and freedom of movement in the toe area. The casual sneaker is made of robust yet supple goatskin leather and breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber. The original TrueSense® GO1 barefoot sole is flat, extremely thin and can be bent in all directions. So you enjoy freedom of movement and direct contact with the ground with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Amsterdam Barefoot+ Men
item.description: Our summer classic among the Groundies barefoot shoes is now also available in Barefoot+: Our Amsterdam is light and airy, can be combined in a variety of ways and, thanks to its wide toe box, provides extra space and freedom of movement in the toe area. The casual sneaker is made of robust yet supple goatskin leather and breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber. The original TrueSense® GO1 barefoot sole is flat, extremely thin and can be bent in all directions. So you enjoy freedom of movement and direct contact with the ground with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Galaxy Men
item.description: This stylish premium barefoot sneaker comes in four color variants right off the bat! Ultra-flexible, versatile, and equipped with an anatomical toe box, so your toes can enjoy ample space and mobility. Good looks, yes, but no compromises on quality: The casual sneaker is made of high-quality leather and breathable OnSteam® microfiber lining. The original TrueSense® GS4 barefoot sole is flat, thin, yet provides enough grip. This way, you enjoy freedom of movement and direct contact with the ground with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lima Women
item.description: A redefined urban classic! Our Groundies® Barefoot Sneaker Lima is the successor to our popular Brooklyn Low and for everyone looking for an uncomplicated all-rounder, but do not want to forego sustainability. This vegan unisex barefoot sneaker has been sustainably manufactured and ensures pleasant air circulation thanks to its breathable lining made from 100% organic cotton and an insole made from OnSteam® microfiber. The thin and flexible sole creates a noticeably light barefoot feeling, while the anatomical toe box provides enough space in the toe area.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lima Women
item.description: A redefined urban classic! item.title: GROUNDIES® Blaze Barefoot+ Women
item.description: Comfort in every direction! Our Groundies® Comfort Barefoot Sneaker Blaze Barefoot+ is for everyone who desires maximum comfort while walking and standing. Equipped with an extra-wide toe box, it also offers ample room for movement and rolling space for wide feet. The high-quality leather ensures special durability, while the breathable OnSteam® microfiber lining provides pleasant air circulation. The thin and flexible sole creates a noticeably lightweight barefoot feeling. A comfortable and elegant barefoot shoe in extra wide.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lou Kids
item.description: Our Groundies® Kids\' Barefoot Shoe Lou has the potential to become a best buddy. Made of high-quality goat leather and robust mesh inserts, this children\'s shoe impresses not just with its simple and cool look, but also thanks to its thin and flexible sole, it\'s exceptionally comfortable. The child-friendly marking of left and right on the outsole, easy entry thanks to the heel and tongue loop, and simple Velcro closure ensure easy slipping in and out. Breathable lining made of OnSteam® microfiber ensures a healthy foot climate from the first steps, while the anatomical toe box allows for a foot-friendly, wider fit in the toe area. Sustainable plus: The recycled rubber sole.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lou Kids
item.description: Our Groundies® Kids\' Barefoot Shoe Lou has the potential to become a best buddy. item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova Special Women
item.description: Groundies® fans should be well acquainted with our Nova by now. Now, the popular Groundies® Barefoot Sneaker comes in a Special Edition! Space Pink, Black Dust/Silver, or Black Dust/Black? Whichever design wins the race: Nova stands for newness and the symbiosis of modern aesthetics with luxury and a genuine barefoot feeling. The design of this sneaker is defined by subtly contrasting elements made of fine leather, an exclusive color selection, and elegant branding near the lacing. The foot-friendly cut and the sensitive TrueSense® Barefoot Sole ensure great comfort and a barefoot feeling.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GS1 Women
item.description: Our Groundies® Barefoot Sneaker Nova GS stands for innovation and the symbiosis of modern aesthetics with luxury and genuine barefoot feeling. The design of this sneaker is characterized by subtly contrasting elements of fine leather, an exclusive color selection, and sophisticated branding near the lacing. The foot-friendly cut and the sensitive TrueSense® Barefoot Sole ensure great comfort and barefoot sensation.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Women
item.description: With our Groundies Active Knit, the name says it all. The barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active people who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it hugs the foot like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Women
item.description: Same same but different: This new Universe comes with new leather and feels even better! Everything else remains uncompromisingly revolutionary: Natural foot freedom and casual street style have never been so seamlessly combined. Clean lines and soft leather make every outfit a statement. The brand-new, innovative TrueSense® GS1 sole is only 6.9 mm thick, flexible, and durable. It gives you a barefoot feeling while protecting your feet like a conventional shoe.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain High 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain High is the ideal hiking shoe for outdoor adventures. With the revised GH2 TrueSense® hiking sole, it offers optimal grip, a wider toe box, and improved comfort. Its upper material made of recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable, while the soft ankle padding ensures pleasant comfort even on long tours. Stability and support are provided by the thoughtful lacing zones at the instep. The All Terrain High combines the benefits of a barefoot shoe with the robustness required by challenging terrain a must-have for outdoor enthusiasts.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain High 2.0 Men
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain High is the ideal hiking shoe for outdoor adventures. With the revised GH2 TrueSense® hiking sole, it offers optimal grip, a wider toe box, and improved comfort. Its upper material made of recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable, while the soft ankle padding ensures pleasant comfort even on long tours. Stability and support are provided by the thoughtful lacing zones at the instep. The All Terrain High combines the benefits of a barefoot shoe with the robustness required by challenging terrain a must-have for outdoor enthusiasts.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain Low 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain Low combines stability, flexibility, and lightness in a robust outdoor shoe. Thanks to the GH2 TrueSense® hiking sole with improved grip and the surrounding protective plastic applications, it offers reliable protection and impact resistance ideal for hikes in moderately difficult terrain. The vegan upper material made from recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable. This barefoot shoe is the perfect companion for outdoor adventures where comfort and functionality are the focus.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain Low 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain Low combines stability, flexibility, and lightness in a robust outdoor shoe. Thanks to the GH2 TrueSense® hiking sole with improved grip and the surrounding protective plastic applications, it offers reliable protection and impact resistance ideal for hikes in moderately difficult terrain. The vegan upper material made from recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable. This barefoot shoe is the perfect companion for outdoor adventures where comfort and functionality are the focus.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain High 2.0 Men
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain High is the ideal hiking shoe for outdoor adventures. item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Women
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Universe sets new standards in the barefoot segment. With its TrueSense® GS1 sneaker sole, it combines natural foot freedom with modern street style. Clean lines and soft leather make it a statement piece for versatile urban looks. The breathable mesh lining ensures long-lasting comfort, while the flexible sole provides an authentic barefoot feel. Developed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal, this bestseller impresses with its high-quality leather and bold color accents.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Men
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Universe sets new standards in the barefoot segment. With its TrueSense® GS1 sneaker sole, it combines natural foot freedom with modern street style. Clean lines and soft leather make it a statement piece for versatile urban looks. The breathable mesh lining ensures long-lasting comfort, while the flexible sole provides an authentic barefoot feel. Developed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal, this bestseller impresses with its high-quality leather and bold color accents.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Amsterdam Barefoot+ Women
item.description: Urban, minimalist, versatile. The Amsterdam Barefoot+ combines minimalist design with ultimate comfort. With its metallic gold finish, it catches the eye, while the GO1+ sole provides an exceptionally light walking experience. Wider feet enjoy extra space, and the breathable onSteam® lining keeps your feet fresh. Flexibility, support, and a bold look. Made for those who expect more from a sneaker.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ghent Women
item.description: The sporty Ghent loafer combines a stylish look with functionality. The soft goat suede ensures a pleasant wearing experience, while the new TrueSense® Street sole provides flexibility and comfort. Minimalist with no lining but featuring microfiber at the heel, the Ghent is perfect for mild, dry days. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal. Versatile, lightweight, and perfect for everyday wear.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ghent Men
item.description: The sporty Ghent loafer combines a stylish look with functionality. The soft cowhide suede ensures a pleasant wearing experience, while the new TrueSense® Street sole provides flexibility and comfort. Minimalist with no lining but featuring microfiber at the heel, the Ghent is perfect for mild, dry days. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal. Versatile, lightweight, and perfect for everyday wear.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ghent Women
item.description: The sporty Ghent loafer combines a stylish look with functionality. Minimalist with no lining but featuring microfiber at the heel, the Ghent is perfect for mild, dry days. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal. Versatile, lightweight, and perfect for everyday wear.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Milano Men
item.description: The classic Milano lace-up shoe combines timeless design with barefoot comfort. Whether in black or caramel with a brushed two-tone finish, this ankle-high lace-up matches any look. The upper made of durable smooth leather and the breathable onSteam® lining ensure a pleasant wearing experience. With the TrueSense® Original sole and anatomical toe box, the Milano offers a natural walking feel. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal. Your durable everyday companion.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Palermo Men
item.description: Simple, versatile, modern. The classic Palermo lace-up shoe combines minimalist design with maximum comfort. The brushed caramel-colored smooth leather adds subtle elegance, while the TrueSense® GO1 sole delivers an authentic barefoot feel. With an anatomical toe box and breathable onSteam® lining, the Palermo accompanies you effortlessly through the day whether at the office or in everyday life. Designed in Germany, handcrafted in Portugal.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GS1 Women
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Nova GS1 combines modern aesthetics with pure barefoot comfort. The material mix of cow suede and nubuck leather enhances its exclusive look, while subtle details and discreet branding add a stylish accent. The TrueSense® GS1 Sneaker Sole provides a natural walking experience, and the foot-friendly fit ensures space and comfort. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal, the Nova GS1 is the perfect choice for versatile looks and mild days.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GS1 Men
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Nova GS1 combines modern aesthetics with pure barefoot comfort. item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova Special Women
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Nova Special brings fresh colors and modern details to the popular Nova style. This sneaker combines smooth leather with suede elements for an exciting material mix. The TrueSense® GS1 Sneaker Sole ensures flexibility and an authentic barefoot feel, while the breathable onSteam® lining provides long-lasting comfort. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal, the Nova Special is a stylish unisex sneaker that impresses in any situation.

item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Nova Special brings fresh colors and modern details to the popular Nova style. item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GO1 Women
item.description: The Groundies Sneaker Nova GO1 is a versatile classic that combines modern design with a natural barefoot feel. The material mix of cow suede and nubuck leather ensures a premium look, while the TrueSense® GO1 Sole provides freedom of movement and flexibility. The anatomical toe box allows for natural foot movement, and the breathable onSteam® lining guarantees all-day comfort. Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal, the Nova GO1 is the perfect choice for mild temperatures and versatile looks.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Balance 2.0 Women
item.description: Dynamic, agile, and perfect for your workout: The new Balance 2.0 gives your feet the freedom they need. Whether at the gym, during Pilates, or functional training the generous toe box provides maximum space so your toes can stay active. The breathable mesh upper ensures a pleasantly light feel and keeps your feet fresh even during intense sessions. Train naturally, freely, and full of energy. Now in new colors and with an updated sole design for even more style and performance!

item.title: GROUNDIES® Zürich Women
item.description: Minimalist, urban, and incredibly comfortable: the Zurich barefoot sneaker brings relaxed style to your everyday life. Its wide barefoot shoe bed ensures comfort, while harmonious color combinations and the interplay of suede and textile add a soft, playful touch to the look. Whether you\'re shopping, at a café, or out and about in the city: with Zurich, youll enjoy full freedom of movement and casual chic. The innovative TrueSense® Street sole provides flexibility and a natural walking experience. For even more comfort with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Zürich Men
item.description: Minimalist, urban, and incredibly comfortable: the Zurich barefoot sneaker brings relaxed style to your everyday life. Its wide barefoot shoe bed ensures comfort, while harmonious color combinations and the interplay of suede and textile add a soft, playful touch to the look. Whether you\'re shopping, at a café, or out and about in the city: with Zurich, youll enjoy full freedom of movement and casual chic. The innovative TrueSense® Street sole provides flexibility and a natural walking experience. For even more comfort with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ruby 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies Ballerina Ruby is lightness made easy. With its flexible TrueSense® GB2 ballerina sole and the elastic edging, it adapts effortlessly and provides a natural barefoot feel.Soft leather ensures a pleasant tactile experience, while the microfiber heel cushion offers gentle support.Perfect for warm days, whether relaxed or elegant Ruby makes every step effortless.Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ruby 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies Ballerina Ruby is lightness made easy. With its flexible TrueSense® GB2 ballerina sole and elastic edging, it adapts effortlessly and provides a natural barefoot feel.Soft leather ensures a pleasant tactile experience, while the microfiber heel cushion offers gentle support.Perfect for warm days, whether relaxed or elegant Ruby makes every step effortless.Designed in Germany and handcrafted in Portugal.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ballet 2.0 Women
item.description: Classic and unobtrusive: Our Groundies Barefoot Ballerina Ballet is an absolute must-have for a timeless wardrobe and many summer styles. Improved fit thanks to the higher, elastic edging, easy to slip into, and loads of comfort with a breezy, lightweight barefoot feeling. Fits well, looks chic, and is ultra-comfortable: The high-quality and supple calf leather is finely grained, especially soft, and simultaneously very durable. The flexible walking experience and ample space in the toe box make our Barefoot Ballerina Ballet the ultimate comfort ballerina.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lily 3.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies Ballerina Lily 3.0 combines simple elegance with unparalleled comfort, unlike classic ballerinas that often feel restrictive.The supple goat leather gently adapts to the shape of the foot and prevents pressure points. The anatomical toe box provides natural freedom of movement without losing the elegant silhouette.The breathable onSteam® microfiber lining ensures a fresh climate, while the ultra-flexible TrueSense® ballerina sole provides a feather-light barefoot feel. Stylish. Comfortable. Natural.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lily 3.0 Barefoot+ Women
item.description: The Groundies Ballerina Lily 3.0 combines simple elegance with unparalleled comfort, unlike classic ballerinas that often feel restrictive.The supple goat leather gently adapts to the shape of the foot and prevents pressure points. The anatomical toe box provides natural freedom of movement without losing the elegant silhouette.The breathable onSteam® microfiber lining ensures a fresh climate, while the ultra-flexible TrueSense® ballerina sole provides a feather-light barefoot feel. Stylish. Comfortable. Natural.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Corfu Women
item.description: Minimalist, modern, and ultra-lightweight: The Corfu sandal blends slim synthetic straps in smooth leather look with a wide, knitted textile band. Subtle cross details at the ankles create a clean aesthetic. The ultra-light barefoot sandal sole with a 5 mm base and 0 mm tread lets your foot roll naturally.Breathable comfort included: The insole made of soft goatskin leather feels wonderfully smooth and allows your feet to breathe. Perfect for hot days and relaxed styles!

item.title: GROUNDIES® Corfu Women
item.description: Minimalist, modern, and ultra-light: The Corfu sandal combines slim synthetic straps with a smooth leather look and a wide knitted textile strap. Subtle crisscross details at the ankles add a clean aesthetic. The ultra-light barefoot sandal sole with a 5 mm base and 0 mm tread allows for a natural rolling motion.Breathable comfort included: The insole made of soft goatskin leather feels amazing and lets your feet breathe. Perfect for hot days and relaxed looks!

item.title: GROUNDIES® Corfu Women
item.description: Minimalist, modern, and ultra-lightweight: The Corfu sandal blends slim synthetic straps in smooth leather look with a wide, knitted textile band. Subtle cross details at the ankles create a clean aesthetic. The ultra-light barefoot sandal sole with a 5 mm base and 0 mm tread lets your foot roll naturally.Breathable comfort included: The insole made of soft goatskin leather feels wonderfully smooth and allows your feet to breathe. Perfect for hot days and relaxed styles!

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kobe Women
item.description: The high-top minimalist shoe Kobe adapts to your foot like a second skin - without constriction, without pressure points. Slip it on like a sock and enjoy pure freedom of movement.The TrueSense® Street Pro sole not only provides an unmatched barefoot feel, but also protects the shoe with a raised, rubberized edge - for extra durability in high-stress areas.Additional suede details at the heel and toe area enhance resistance even more.Maximum flexibility and protection - with Kobe, youll experience barefoot comfort on a whole new level.Ideal for your activities - perfect for indoor and dry-weather outdoor training.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kobe Women
item.description: The high-top minimalist shoe Kobe adapts to your foot like a second skin - without constriction, without pressure points. Slip it on like a sock and enjoy pure freedom of movement.The TrueSense® Street Pro sole not only provides an unmatched barefoot feel, but also protects the shoe with a raised, rubberized edge - for extra durability in high-stress areas.Additional suede details at the heel and toe area enhance resistance even more.Maximum flexibility and protection - with Kobe, youll experience barefoot comfort on a whole new level.Ideal for your activities - perfect for indoor and dry-weather outdoor training.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Osaka Women
item.description: Maximum freedom of movement, zero restrictions: Osaka is your game-changer for fitness and leisure. As a barefoot sneaker, it combines the full flexibility of the TrueSense® Street sole with the ultra-lightweight synthetic knit that hugs your foot like a second skin. For a natural walking sensation and unrestricted dynamics whether at the gym or on the go.The side suede strip provides a sporty, dynamic look. Thanks to the smart lacing, the shoe fits securely and slip-free. Ideal for those who want to combine athleisure with a barefoot feel.Ultralight, flexible and stylish: Osaka gets you moving.

item.description: Maximum freedom of movement, zero restrictions: Osaka is your game-changer for fitness and leisure. item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain High 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain 2.0 High is the ideal hiking shoe for outdoor adventures. Featuring the updated GH2 TrueSense® Hiking sole, it offers optimal grip, a wider toe box, and improved comfort. Its upper made from recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable, while the soft ankle padding ensures lasting comfort even on long hikes. Clever lacing zones across the instep provide stability and support. The All Terrain High combines the benefits of a barefoot shoe with the durability needed for tough terrain. A must-have for outdoor enthusiasts.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Noto Kids
item.description: Childrens feet need space, freedom of movement, and natural support. Thats exactly what our Noto offers! Thanks to its wide, flexible sole, this sandal promotes natural foot development and playfully strengthens muscles and balance with every step.The soft goatskin leather gently hugs the foot and allows unrestricted movement, while the breathable onSteam® microfiber ensures a dry and comfortable feeling even on hot summer days. The closed toe box protects little adventurers perfectly, whether climbing, running, or playing in nature.Paired with breezy summer dresses or casual shorts: Noto Kids offers little explorers stylish, foot-friendly, and child-appropriate footwear.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Noto Kids
item.description: Childrens feet need space, freedom of movement, and natural support. Thats exactly what our Noto offers! Thanks to its wide, flexible sole, this sandal promotes natural foot development and playfully strengthens muscles and balance with every step.The soft goatskin leather gently hugs the foot and allows unrestricted movement, while the breathable onSteam® microfiber ensures a dry and comfortable feeling even on hot summer days. item.title: GROUNDIES® Noto Kids
item.description: Childrens feet need space, freedom of movement, and natural support. Thats exactly what our Noto offers! item.title: GROUNDIES® Nara Kids
item.description: Kids love to run, jump, and play: and Nara is up for it all. This ultra-comfy slip-on sneaker wraps around little feet like a second skin thanks to its flexible knit material without any pressure points. Breathable, super lightweight, and airy, Nara is the perfect companion for warm days.Thanks to its clever design, kids can easily slip them on and learn to put on their shoes by themselves all while having fun. Smooth leather at the heel protects sensitive areas and adds durability even for wild adventures on the playground or out in nature.The flexible TrueSense® Kids sole supports the natural development of muscles, balance, and motor skills for healthy kids\' feet that move freely and confidently.Soft. Light. Tough for everyday life. Nara is the new favorite for active kids.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Men
item.description: The Groundies Active Knit is aptly named. This barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active individuals who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it fits like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: a top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Verona Vegan Women
item.description: Timeless and relaxed: Our Verona sandal is a fashion statement that blends classic design with a casual touch. Perfect for everyday wear and a stylish upgrade to any outfit.The elastic insert on the heel strap ensures a secure fit without slipping and adapts flexibly to your foot. And of course, comfort is not forgotten: The TrueSense® GC2 sandal sole delivers a pleasantly natural walking sensation. Lightweight, flexible, and comfortable.
